metadata.Title: CVE-2007-1923 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: (1) LedgerSMB and (2) DWS Systems SQL-Ledger implement access control listsby changing the set of URLs linked from menus, which allows remoteattackers to access restricted functionality via direct requests. TheLedgerSMB affected versions are before 1.3.0.

criterions.comment: sql-ledger: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
